text: Other People's Children ( translit. Skhvisi shvilebi, ) is a 1958 Georgian black-and-white drama movie directed by Tengiz Abuladze and starring Tsitsino Tsitsishvili, Otar Koberidze, Asmat Qandaurashvili. == Other websites == * Category:1958 drama movies Category:Black-and-white movies Category:Georgian movies Category:Movies directed by Tengiz Abuladze
title: Other People's Children
